item.title: It’s ‘kind of jarring’: AI labs like Meta, Deepseek, and Xai earned some of the worst grades possible on an existential safety index
item.description: Anthropic, OpenAI, and Google DeepMind took the top three spots with an overall grade of C+ or C.

item.title: U.S. consumers are so financially strained they put more than $1 billion on buy-now, pay later services during Black Friday and Cyber Monday
item.description: BNPL made up for more than 7.2% of total online sales on Cyber Monday.

item.title: Musk’s SpaceX discusses record valuation, IPO as soon as 2026
item.description: The transaction would value Elon Musk’s startup at a valuation higher than OpenAI’s record-setting $500 billion, people familiar with the matter said.

item.title: The rise of AI reasoning models comes with a big energy tradeoff
item.description: AI reasoning models used 30 times more power on average to respond to 1,000 written prompts than alternatives without it, a new study finds.

item.title: Hollywood writers say Warner takeover ‘must be blocked’
item.description: “The world’s largest streaming company swallowing one of its biggest competitors is what antitrust laws were designed to prevent,” the WGA said.
